## Validate.toConditionIndex() function

Converts a number to a [ConditionIndex](./ts-res.conditionindex.md) if it is a valid condition index.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function toConditionIndex(index: number): Result<ConditionIndex>;
```

the number to convert


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Result&lt;[ConditionIndex](./ts-res.conditionindex.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the converted [ConditionIndex](./ts-res.conditionindex.md) if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if not.
